attributes.title: bad luck app!!
attributes.review: this app killed my crops and uncleared my skin and destroyed my once-lovely farmhouse. i am writing this im the middle of my wilted field, staring at my screen with a face that is just one angry red pimple. i believe this app was created with witchcraft, and anyone who uses it will be hexed or cursed. please, PLEASE, do not risk it. i dont know if i will ever recover from this.

attributes.title: HORBILE APP IT ATE MY DOG ASWELL
attributes.review: this is a horrible app it made my phone glitch out and it gave my phone a virus so now i have to use my laptop also i downloaded the app and my dog was laying on my bed next to me and as soon as i went on the app my phone jumped out of my hand and ate my dog while i was on the app. wouldn’t recommend it eats dogs💀

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY AWFUL
attributes.review: are you kidding me?? here i am trying to enjoy some comedy gold by looking at this campaign and my phone totally shut down! i took it to the phone repair place and they said the app gave me “cheeto virus” or CH33TO-20. thanks a lot! why don’t you put those little hands to work and fix this!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: To think the president can run a country good he could make an app, I’m so disappointed this app really makes me want to become a republican and vote for trump... everytime I open it it messed up my phone, I had to buy a new phone and a new Apple ID to give this app a review... just stick with the sanders app smh

attributes.title: unacceptable
attributes.review: I opened this app and it Made my Minecraft dog become a dinosaur and crush all my diamonds and then he came out my screen and almost killed me he then turned into Chester the cheetah and ate all my Cheeto puffs then a cow ran through my window and ate my hair now I’m bald and then the cow became a dragon and burned my house down

attributes.title: THIS APP KILLED MY CAT
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app in support of our presidential orange, and could not be more disappointed. This application gave my cat cancer and burned down my pool. If that wasn't enough it just so happens that this app also caused the wildfires in California and Australia. After Careful consideration I cannot recommend downloading this app UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES!!!!!!

-RIP TIKTOK😓😤

attributes.title: TERRIBLE DELETE THIS APP
attributes.review: This app is the worst I have ever installed. I didn’t know they even made apps this bad. My whole phone is slower and it keeps crashing. It keeps trying to charge me money and glitch. This app is awful and should be deleted because it has so many bugs.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE😭😭😁
attributes.review: the second i downloaded the app it shut my phone off and never turned back on i had to buy a new phone then when i got my new phone the app was saved on it and it hacked all of my emails and social media accounts... very terrible...

attributes.title: too much going on 😡
attributes.review: i open the app, and the design is absolutely horrible already! hurt my eyes. not to mention it asked for my PRIVATE information such as my phone number. was COMPLETELY useless. i don’t think this app contributes anything to our lives, nor the presidential race.

attributes.title: Unacceptable!!
attributes.review: When I first opened this app I excited to read the recent news about president Trump. However, when I went to the “Donate to Campaign” page it asked for MY FIRST BORN instead of a couple dollars. This is UNACCEPTABLE. Mr. Trump’s media team needs to be more professional, never been more disappointed. 1 Star 😡
